title: My flex rank win dont give me LP
body: Ive won 3 games in a row and didin't get a single LP, I think it might be a bug because ive check my match history and its realy written flex rank next to these games, pls help

replies.body: I've pulled up your recent League ranked match history, and I thiiiiink I may have found the main issue. It doesn't look like this account has been placed, but it does look like you've just recently finished your placement matches. After playing the next ranked SR match, you should see yourself placed and start earning LP.
